title: RPG Music Pack: Necrotic Theme
description: RPG Music Pack: Necrotic Theme, featuring 18 high-quality, undead-themed dark fantasy music tracks, perfect for enhancing your dark-themed projects.
longDescription:
"So, we will confront you right there at the Leeching Gates. Pray that there are those who resurrect you when you die. Even if the Necropolis dies, the gate never truly perished; you still have a chance."


RPG Music: Necrotic Theme package is now updated for it's users for free!


ADDED FILES


  1. Dark Prophecy - Full
  2. Dark Prophecy - Loop
  3. Textural Captive - Full
  4. Textural Captive - Loop
  5. The Loner - Loop
  6. The Loner - Isolated Guitar Loop


The package includes 18 music that is strong in terms of melodic and ambient effect, mainly containing atmosphere and game opening music. Necrotic Theme is thematically dark, necrotic, sometimes folkloric, romantic and a mysterious package.


Click HERE to view many songs in full.


MAIN FEATURES


  • Each song has a Full Version, and these songs have their endings.
  • Each piece has a Loop Version, and these songs can loop from start to finish.
  • When you own the products, you also have Commercial Rights.
  • You can use the products as you wish on YouTube and similar platforms.


Atmospheres


  1. Blood Ruins
  2. Fairies
  3. Haunted Mines
  4. Lurker Forest
  5. Lurker Forest 2
  6. Soul Village

Game Openings

  4. March of the Dead


Melodic Atmospheres


  1. Graveyard
  2. Longhouse


More Info


  • Unique Audio Count: 18
  • Total Audio Count: 36
  • Unique Audio Length: 32 mins

  • Total Size: 944 MB
  • Looping: Yes

  • Sample Rate: 44100
  • Mastered: Yes
technicalDetails:
You can email us with new ideas and opinions, technical questions, corrections or inquiries, or even just to chat. Your feedback enhances the value of every product you purchase, and we consider it important.


FAQ


Can I use your products in my commercial projects without any restrictions?

Yes, absolutely! You can use them in all kinds of content, including films, games, or YouTube videos, even for commercial purposes.


Will there be a problem if I upload a video to YouTube that contains music from Intersonic Sound?

No, it won't. The products are not registered with Content ID and are structured to not claim rights. You will not receive a copystrike warning for your channel.


Do you update your products?

There are products that we have updated and will continue to update. We may not update all of them, but the likelihood of us adding new content to your purchased product as a free update is very high.


What file format do you use?

We prefer 24-bit WAV files. If the package size becomes too large, we might consider 16-bit WAV, but we have not done this yet. For now, we have processed every product as a 24-bit WAV.
